body:
#### PR description:
Changed boost::ptr_vector for std::vector<std::unique_ptr<>>
The code should have the same behavior.

#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

title: Reduce boost dependency in PhysicsTools/PatAlgos
